name: FINDRISK Diabetes Risk Calculator
description: Finnish Diabetes Risk Score - Predicts 10-year risk of developing Type 2 diabetes
patientFriendlyDescription: Find out your risk of developing diabetes in the next 10 years

questions.label: Body Mass Index (BMI)
questions.description: What is your BMI in kg/m²? If you don't know your BMI, you can calculate it: weight (kg) ÷ [height (m)]²

questions.label: Waist Circumference
questions.description: What is your waist circumference? Measure around your waist at the level of your navel

questions.label: Physical Activity
questions.description: Do you get at least 30 minutes of physical activity most days? This includes work, exercise, or daily activities like walking.

options.label: Yes, at least 30 minutes per day
No, less than 30 minutes per day

questions.label: Daily Fruits and Vegetables
questions.description: Do you eat fruits, vegetables, or berries every day?

questions.label: Blood Pressure Medication
questions.description: Have you ever taken medication for high blood pressure regularly?

questions.label: History of High Blood Sugar
questions.description: Have you ever been told you have high blood sugar? This could be during a health exam, illness, or pregnancy.

questions.label: Family History of Diabetes
questions.description: Have any of your family members been diagnosed with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes?

options.label: Yes: grandparent, aunt, uncle, or cousin

riskCategories.name: Low Risk
riskCategories.description: Your risk of developing type 2 diabetes within 10 years is estimated to be 1 in 100
recommendations: Continue maintaining healthy lifestyle habits
Regular physical activity (at least 150 minutes moderate exercise per week)
Maintain healthy weight and balanced diet
Annual health check-ups with routine blood sugar screening

riskCategories.name: Slightly Elevated Risk
riskCategories.description: Your risk of developing type 2 diabetes within 10 years is estimated to be 1 in 25
recommendations: Focus on lifestyle modifications to reduce risk
Increase physical activity to at least 150 minutes per week
Work on achieving and maintaining healthy weight
Consider consultation with healthcare provider for personalized prevention plan
Annual diabetes screening with blood tests

riskCategories.name: Moderate Risk
riskCategories.description: Your risk of developing type 2 diabetes within 10 years is estimated to be 1 in 6
recommendations: Schedule consultation with healthcare provider within 3-6 months
Consider structured lifestyle intervention program
Implement comprehensive diet and exercise plan
Regular monitoring of blood glucose levels
Consider referral to diabetes prevention program

riskCategories.name: High Risk
riskCategories.description: Your risk of developing type 2 diabetes within 10 years is estimated to be 1 in 3
recommendations: Schedule consultation with healthcare provider as soon as possible
Enroll in structured diabetes prevention program
Work with healthcare team to develop comprehensive prevention plan
Regular monitoring of blood glucose and other metabolic markers
Consider medication for diabetes prevention if lifestyle changes insufficient

riskCategories.name: Very High Risk
riskCategories.description: Your risk of developing type 2 diabetes within 10 years is estimated to be 1 in 2
recommendations: Schedule urgent consultation with healthcare provider
Immediate enrollment in intensive diabetes prevention program
Consider medication for diabetes prevention
Frequent monitoring of blood glucose and metabolic health
Work closely with healthcare team for comprehensive risk management

metadata.clinicalUse: Screening tool for identifying individuals at high risk of developing Type 2 diabetes within 10 years
